item.title: About me
item.description: My name is James, I'm a Brazilian software developer working with IT since 2009. I hold a BS in Computer Science and an MSc in Software Engineering from UNESP, in SÃ£o Paulo - Brazil. Currently, I'm pursuing my PhD at IMT Atlantique in Nantes - France, researching the use of Machine Learning techniques applied to Model Views in the context of Model-Driven Engineering. I consider myself a tech generalist, so my interests range from trivial programming problems to the unavoidable breakthroughs in the tech landscape brought by AI in the last few years.
